title: Toward Autonomous and Efficient Cybersecurity: A Multi-Objective AutoML-based Intrusion Detection System
summary: With increasingly sophisticated cybersecurity threats and rising demand for network automation, autonomous cybersecurity mechanisms are becoming critical for securing modern networks. The rapid expansion of Internet of Things (IoT) systems amplifies these challenges, as resource-constrained IoT devices demand scalable and efficient security solutions.
